# Getting started

Once `r Rpackage("agGraphSearch")` is installed, it can be loaded by the following command.

```{r library, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
#rm( list=ls() )
library(agGraphSearch)
library(magrittr)

#Re-build
rm(list=ls())

if(F){
system("rm -rf ./agGraphSearch/NAMESPACE")
roxygen2::roxygenise("./agGraphSearch")
system("cat ./agGraphSearch/NAMESPACE")
remove.packages("agGraphSearch", lib=.libPaths())
.rs.restartR()
}
#install.packages(c("SPARQL", "franc", "formattable"))

if(F){
system("R CMD INSTALL agGraphSearch")
Sys.sleep(1)
library(agGraphSearch)
}

if(F){
proxy_url = "http://wwwproxy.osakac.ac.jp:8080"
Sys.setenv("http_proxy" = proxy_url)
Sys.setenv("https_proxy" = proxy_url)
Sys.setenv("ftp_proxy" = proxy_url)
}

if(F){
proxy_url = "http://wwwproxy.osakac.ac.jp:8080"
Sys.setenv("http_proxy" = proxy_url)
Sys.setenv("https_proxy" = proxy_url)
Sys.setenv("ftp_proxy" = proxy_url)
devtools::install_github( "kumeS/agGraphSearch" )
library(agGraphSearch)
}

if(F){
devtools::install_github( "kumeS/agGraphSearch" )
library(agGraphSearch)
}

if(!dir.exists("05_ChEBI_OCR_00")){dir.create("05_ChEBI_OCR_00")}
if(!dir.exists("05_ChEBI_OCR_01_Out")){dir.create("05_ChEBI_OCR_01_Out")}
if(!dir.exists("05_ChEBI_OCR_02_Out")){dir.create("05_ChEBI_OCR_02_Out")}
if(!dir.exists("05_ChEBI_OCR_03_Out")){dir.create("05_ChEBI_OCR_03_Out")}
if(!dir.exists("05_ChEBI_OCR_04_Jpn")){dir.create("05_ChEBI_OCR_04_Jpn")}
if(!dir.exists("05_ChEBI_OCR_05_RDF")){dir.create("05_ChEBI_OCR_05_RDF")}

```

# Read the csv files

You should split compound words as a pre-processing.

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
words <- data.frame(readr::read_csv("./05_ChEBI_OCR_00/高分子辞典OCR_2column_en.csv", col_names = F, show_col_types = F))
words <- unlist(words, use.names = F)
words <- data.frame(X1=words[!is.na(words)])
dim(words)
```

# check the data

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
head(words)
dim(words)

#unique number
length(unique(words))

#table
head(words)
```

# Import ChEBI data (2021)

```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}

if(F){
ChEBILabels <- readRDS("./05_ChEBI_OCR_00/ChEBI_Label_en_dfR.Rds")
head(ChEBILabels)
table(ChEBILabels$Property)
dim(ChEBILabels)

ChEBIOthers <- readRDS("./05_ChEBI_OCR_00/ChEBI_othersR.Rds")
head(ChEBIOthers)
table(ChEBIOthers$Property)
dim(ChEBIOthers)

ChEBILabelsR <- ChEBILabels[ChEBILabels$Subject %in% unique(c(ChEBIOthers$Subject, ChEBIOthers$Object)),]
dim(ChEBILabelsR)
saveRDS(ChEBILabelsR, "./05_ChEBI_OCR_00/ChEBILabelsR.Rds")
}

```

# Linking of input words to the ChEBI words

Input words in English are 408.

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
words <- unlist(words, use.names = F)
words <- words[!is.na(words)]
words <- words[words != ""]
words <- unique(words)

head(words)
length(unique(words))
words00 <- unique(unlist(words)); words00 <- words00[!is.na(words00)]
words01 <- unique(tolower(words00))
head(words01)

#小文字変換
ChEBILabelsR <- readRDS("./05_ChEBI_OCR_00/ChEBILabelsR.Rds")
head(ChEBILabelsR)
ChEBILabels01 <- unique(tolower(ChEBILabelsR$Object))
head(ChEBILabels01)
length(ChEBILabels01)

#文字列距離実行
library( agGraphSearch )
Dat <- ComputeDistance(InputTerms=words01,
                       RDFterms=ChEBILabels01,
                       q=2, nthread=4, TopWords=3)
  
head(Dat)
#Dat[is.na(Dat)] <- 0
table(Dat$PerfectMatch > 0)
table(Dat$PartialMatch > 0)
table(Dat$cosine1 > 0)
table(Dat$cosine3 < 0.075)
#saveRDS(Dat, "./05_ChEBI_OCR_01_Out/Dat_OCR_en_match.Rds")

```

#閾値0.075で切る

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
head(Dat)
words02 <- Dat[Dat$cosine3 < 0.075, ]
head(words02)
dim(words02)
rownames(words02) <- 1:nrow(words02)
#saveRDS(words02, "./05_ChEBI_OCR_01_Out/Dat_OCR_en_words02.Rds")

```

# Translate English to Japanese

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
#rm(list=ls())
words02 <- readRDS("./05_ChEBI_OCR_01_Out/Dat_OCR_en_words02.Rds")
head(words02)
dim(words02)

words02$Lab00 <- NA
head(words02)

#ラベルを逆にする
head(words02)
words02$Lab00 <- tolower(words02$cosine2)
words02$Lab01 <- NA
head(words02)

table(grepl("[,][ ]", words02$Lab00))
table(grepl("[,][ ]and", words02$Lab00))

for(n in 1:length(words02$Lab00)){
#n <- 5
if(grepl("[,][ ]", words02$Lab00[n])){
 aa <- strsplit(words02$Lab00[n], split = ", ")[[1]]
 words02$Lab01[n] <- paste(aa[length(aa):1], collapse = " ")
}else{
 aa <-  words02$Lab00[n]
 words02$Lab01[n] <- aa
}}
table(grepl("[,]", words02$Lab01))

words02$Jpn <- NA
head(words02, n=10)

#proxy at OECU

library(agGraphSearch)

proxy_url = "http://wwwproxy.osakac.ac.jp:8080"

Sys.setenv("https_proxy" = proxy_url)
Sys.setenv("ftp_proxy" = proxy_url)
}

#Translate to Jpn Labels
##################################################################

wordsTerms <- unique(words02$Terms)
str(wordsTerms)
for(n in 1:length(wordsTerms)){
#n <- 1
Result <- DeePL(Sentence=wordsTerms[n], Auth_Key="43725ffd-d3d3-a301-c92d-8d7e2070f71c:fx")
words02$Jpn[words02$Terms == wordsTerms[n]] <- Result
message(colourise(paste("  No.: ", n), fg = "green", bg = NULL))
message(colourise(paste("  ", wordsTerms[n], "=>", Result), fg = "green", bg = NULL))
}

head(words02, n=10)
tail(words02, n=10)
words02[is.na(words02)] <- 0

#PerfectMatch
a <- words02$PerfectMatch > 0
unique(words02$Terms[a])

unique(words02$Terms[a])
sum(a)
```

# Obtain all class hierarchy

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
#修正版の読み込み
#rm(list=ls())

#words
LabList00 <- readRDS("./05_ChEBI_OCR_01_Out/OCR_en_LabList00.Rds")
LabList00
str(LabList00)

#ChEBILabelsR.Rds
ChEBILabelR <- readRDS("./05_ChEBI_OCR_00/ChEBILabelsR.Rds")

head(ChEBILabelR); dim(ChEBILabelR)
table(ChEBILabelR$OtherInfo == "BLANK")
table(ChEBILabelR$Property)
table(ChEBILabelR$SubInfo)

#ChEBI_othersR.Rds
ChEBIOthers <- readRDS("./05_ChEBI_OCR_00/ChEBI_othersR.Rds")

head(ChEBIOthers); dim(ChEBIOthers)
table(ChEBIOthers$OtherInfo == "BLANK")
table(ChEBIOthers$Property)
table(ChEBIOthers$SubInfo)
table(ChEBIOthers$ObjInfo)

##################################################################
#Trial 01
##################################################################
txt <- unique(LabList00)
a1 <- ChEBILabelR[ChEBILabelR$Subject %in% txt,]
a1
#              Subject   Property   Object OtherInfo    SubInfo
#1242522  ChEBI:D011108 rdfs:label Polymers       @en IDs:ChEBI:D
#1906322 ChEBI:M0017208 rdfs:label Polymers       @en IDs:ChEBI:M
a2 <- unique(a1$Subject)
a2

table(txt %in% a2)
##################################################################
#上位探索
##################################################################
Dat <- c(); x <- 1; Query <- a2
repeat{
message(x)
b1 <- ChEBIOthers[ChEBIOthers$Subject %in% Query,]
if(dim(b1)[1] == 0){break}
Dat <- rbind(Dat, b1)
Query <- b1$Object
x <- x + 1
if(x == 100){break}
}

##################################################################
#重複を除く
##################################################################
head(Dat); dim(Dat)
rownames(Dat) <- 1:nrow(Dat)
colnames(Dat) <- c("subject", "property", "parentClass", "OtherInfo", "SubInfo", "ObjInfo")
Dat$triple <- paste0(Dat$subject, ".", Dat$property, ".", Dat$parentClass)
Dat <- Dat[as.numeric(rownames(unique(Dat["triple"]))),]
Dat <- Dat[,-ncol(Dat)]
head(Dat); dim(Dat)
length(unique(c(Dat$subject, Dat$parentClass)))

##################################################################
#最上位
##################################################################
a3 <- unique(Dat$parentClass)[!(unique(Dat$parentClass) %in% unique(Dat$subject))]
str(a3)
a3

##################################################################
#Add labels
##################################################################
ChEBILabelR <- readRDS("./05_ChEBI_OCR_00/ChEBILabelsR.Rds")

library(agGraphSearch)
library(magrittr)
DatX <- MergeChEBIData(Data=Dat, Labels=ChEBILabelR)
head(DatX)
dim(DatX)
length(unique(c(DatX$subject, DatX$parentClass)))
##################################################################
try(agVisNetwork(Graph=DatX,
             Selected=NULL, 
             Browse=TRUE, 
             Output=TRUE,
             ColoredSeed=LabList00,
             ColoredTopClass=a3,
             Physics=T,
             Smooth=T,
             FilePath="upClass_v01.html"))
filesstrings::move_files("upClass_v01.html", "./05_ChEBI_OCR_02_Out")
##################################################################
for(n in 1:length(a3)){
print(n)
try(agJsTree(Data=DatX, 
         TopClass=a3[n], 
         Brouse=TRUE, 
         SaveHtmlFile=TRUE, 
         ExcludeQID=TRUE,
         FileName=paste0("agVisNetwork_upClass_", a3[n], ".html"), 
         Output="./05_ChEBI_OCR_03_Out"))
}

##################################################################

x <- x + 1
```

# Convert to RDF

ChEBIから抽出した結果をRDFに変換する

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
#rm(list=ls())
Dat02 <- readRDS("./05_ChEBI_OCR_01_Out/OCR_Dat02.Rds")
DatJpn03 <- readRDS("./05_ChEBI_OCR_01_Out/OCR_DatJpn03_new.Rds")
topClass <- unique(DatJpn03$parentClass)[!(unique(DatJpn03$parentClass) %in% unique(DatJpn03$subject))]
LabList00 <- readRDS("./05_ChEBI_OCR_01_Out/OCR_en_LabList00.Rds")
#write.csv(topClass, "topClass.csv")
#SPARQL結果をN-triplesに変換

if(T){
#クラス階層
a <- DatJpn03
b <- Dat02
  
##NA対応
table(is.na(a))

#ループ消す
head(a)
table(a$subject != a$parentClass)
a <- a[a$subject != a$parentClass, ]

#table(grepl("ChEBI[:]", a$subject))
#table(grepl("ChEBI[:]", a$parentClass))

nt <- paste("<", sub("ChEBI[:]", "http://id.nlm.nih.gov/ChEBI/", a$subject), "> ",
            "<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#subClassOf> ",
            "<", sub("ChEBI[:]", "http://id.nlm.nih.gov/ChEBI/", a$parentClass), "> .",
            sep="")
nt <- unique(nt)

write.table(nt, "./05_ChEBI_OCR_05_RDF/RDF_from_ChEBI_v01.nt", sep="",
             row.names = F, col.names = F, append=F, quote = F)

colnames(a)

#Labels: a
nt <- paste('<', sub("ChEBI[:]", "http://id.nlm.nih.gov/ChEBI/", a$subject), '> ',
            '<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ',
            '"', a$subjectLabel, '"@ja.',
            sep="")
nt <- unique(nt)
```

## Summary

ChEBI RDFからクラス階層を抽出した結果

1. 高分子辞典のOCR語彙を使用

初期入力語彙: 4520語彙（高分子辞典 英語の語彙のみ）

2. ChEBI RDFの語彙(英語)とエンティティリンキング(コサイン類似度)

エンティティリンキング後: 491 エンティティ

上位展開して、最上位エンティティ: 69 エンティティ

下位展開した結果: 49127 エンティティ / 57359トリプル
